450 SX Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 AND m.Result = 1
250 SX Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 2 AND m.Result = 1
250 SX East/West Showdown Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.CoastID = 3 AND m.Result = 1
450 SX Triple Crown Overall Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 AND m.Result = 1 AND m.TC1 IS NOT NULL
250 SX Triple Crown Overall Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 2 AND m.Result = 1 AND m.TC1 IS NOT NULL
450 SX Triple Crown Main Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 AND (m.TC1 = 1 OR m.TC2 = 1 OR m.TC3 = 1)
250 SX Triple Crown Main Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 2 AND (m.TC1 = 1 OR m.TC2 = 1 OR m.TC3 = 1)
250 SX LCQ Win (2003-Present): SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_LCQS l ON r.RiderID = l.RiderID WHERE l.ClassID = 2 AND l.Result = 1
450 SX LCQ Win (2003-Present): SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_LCQS l ON r.RiderID = l.RiderID WHERE l.ClassID = 1 AND l.Result = 1
5+ 450 SX Wins in One Season: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS s ON r.RiderID = s.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON s.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE s.ClassID = 1 AND s.Result = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName, r.RiderID, rt.Year HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY r.FullName
5+ 250 SX Wins in One Season: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS s ON r.RiderID = s.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON s.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE s.ClassID = 2 AND s.Result = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName, r.RiderID, rt.Year HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY r.FullName
1+ 250 SX Pole Positions (2007-Present): SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_QUAL q ON r.riderID = q.RiderID WHERE q.ClassID = 2 AND q.Result = 1
1+ 450 SX Pole Positions (2007-Present): SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_QUAL q ON r.riderID = q.RiderID WHERE q.ClassID = 1 AND q.Result = 1
10+ 450 SX Wins: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Result = 1 THEN 1 END) >= 10
20+ 450 SX Wins: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Result = 1 THEN 1 END) >= 20
450 MX Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 AND m.Result = 1
250 MX Win: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 2 AND m.Result = 1
1+ 450 SX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 1 AND c.ClassID = 1
1+ 250 SX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 1 AND c.ClassID = 2
1+ 450 MX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 2 AND c.ClassID = 1
1+ 250 MX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 2 AND c.ClassID = 2
450 MX Top 20 Moto Finish (1985-Present): SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mo ON r.RiderID = mo.riderID WHERE mo.ClassID = 1 AND (mo.moto1 <= 20 OR mo.moto2 <= 20)
250 MX Top 20 Moto Finish (1998-Present): SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mo ON r.RiderID = mo.riderID WHERE mo.ClassID = 2 AND (mo.moto1 <= 20 OR mo.moto2 <= 20)
2+ 450 SX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 1 AND c.ClassID = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(c.Year) >= 2
2+ 250 SX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 1 AND c.ClassID = 2 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(c.Year) >= 2
2+ 450 MX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 2 AND c.ClassID = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(c.Year) >= 2
2+ 250 MX Championships: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN Champions c ON r.RiderID = c.RiderID WHERE c.SportID = 2 AND c.ClassID = 2 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(c.Year) >= 2
10+ 450 SX Podiums: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Result <= 3 THEN 1 END) >= 10
10+ 250 SX Podiums: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 2 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Result <= 3 THEN 1 END) >= 10
10+ 450 MX Podiums: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Result <= 3 THEN 1 END) >= 10
10+ 250 MX Podiums: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 2 GROUP BY r.FullName HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Result <= 3 THEN 1 END) >= 10
French SX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.Result = 1 AND r.Country = 'France'
Australian SX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.Result = 1 AND r.Country = 'Australia'
SX Multi-Class Winner: SELECT FullName FROM (SELECT r.FullName, COUNT(DISTINCT m.ClassID) AS class_wins FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.Result = 1 GROUP BY r.FullName) AS subquery WHERE class_wins > 1
KTM: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'KTM'
HUS: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'HUS'
YAM: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'YAM'
HON: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'HON'
SUZ: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'SUZ'
KAW: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'KAW'
GAS: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID WHERE rb.Brand = 'GAS'
Australia: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'Australia'
France: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'France'
United States: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'United States'
Canada: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'Canada'
Spain: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'Spain'
Japan: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'Japan'
Brazil: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country = 'Brazil'
United Kingdom: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country IN ('England', 'Wales', 'Northern Ireland', 'Scotland', 'United Kingdom')
European Nationality: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country IN ('Finland', 'Italy', 'Netherlands', 'Germany', 'England', 'Lithuania', 'Switzerland', 'United Kingdom', 'Sweden', 'Ukraine', 'Czechia', 'Russia', 'Ireland', 'Latvia', 'France', 'Belgium', 'Spain', 'Denmark', 'Estonia', 'Scotland')
South American Nationality: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country IN ('Ecuador', 'Bolivia', 'Brazil', 'Argentina', 'Colombia', 'Chile', 'Venezuela')
Central American Nationality: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country IN ('Guatemala', 'Honduras', 'Costa Rica', 'Dominican Republic')
Asian Nationality: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r WHERE r.Country IN ('South Korea', 'Philippines', 'Japan', 'Mongolia')
Raced in the 1970s: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS sm ON r.RiderID = sm.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 1970 AND 1979 UNION SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mx ON r.RiderID = mx.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON mx.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 1970 AND 1979
Raced in the 1980s: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS sm ON r.RiderID = sm.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 1980 AND 1989 UNION SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mx ON r.RiderID = mx.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON mx.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 1980 AND 1989
Raced in the 1990s: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS sm ON r.RiderID = sm.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 1990 AND 1999 UNION SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mx ON r.RiderID = mx.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON mx.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 1990 AND 1999
Raced in the 2000s: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS sm ON r.RiderID = sm.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2009 UNION SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mx ON r.RiderID = mx.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON mx.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2009
Raced in the 2010s: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS sm ON r.RiderID = sm.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2019 UNION SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mx ON r.RiderID = mx.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON mx.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2019
Raced in the 2020s: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS sm ON r.RiderID = sm.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2029 UNION SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS mx ON r.RiderID = mx.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON mx.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE rt.Year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2029
Anaheim 1 450 SX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID JOIN Race_Table rt ON m.RaceID = rt.RaceID WHERE m.TrackID = 96 AND rt.Round = 1 AND m.ClassID = 1 AND m.Result = 1
Daytona 450 SX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN SX_MAINS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 AND m.Result = 1 AND m.TrackID = 88
Red Bud 450 MX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m ON r.RiderID = m.RiderID WHERE m.ClassID = 1 AND m.Result = 1 AND m.TrackID = 3
250 MX 1+ 1-1 Overall Wins (1998-Present: select distinct r.fullname from rider_list r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m on r.riderid = m.riderid where m.classid = 2 and Moto1 = 1 and moto2 = 1
450 MX 1+ 1-1 Overall Wins (1985-Present: select distinct r.fullname from rider_list r JOIN MX_OVERALLS m on r.riderid = m.riderid where m.classid = 1 and Moto1 = 1 and moto2 = 1
16 Year Old 250 SX Race Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM SX_MAINS sm JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID JOIN Rider_List r ON sm.RiderID = r.RiderID WHERE sm.Result = 1 AND sm.classID = 2 AND r.DOB IS NOT NULL AND (DATEDIFF(YEAR, r.DOB, rt.RaceDate) - CASE WHEN DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, r.DOB, rt.RaceDate), r.DOB) > rt.RaceDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 16
<18 Years Old 250 MX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM MX_OVERALLS sm JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID JOIN Rider_List r ON sm.RiderID = r.RiderID WHERE sm.Result = 1 AND sm.ClassID = 2 AND r.DOB IS NOT NULL AND (DATEDIFF(YEAR, r.DOB, rt.RaceDate) - CASE WHEN DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, r.DOB, rt.RaceDate), r.DOB) > rt.RaceDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) <= 18
Teenage 450 MX Winner: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM MX_OVERALLS sm JOIN Race_Table rt ON sm.RaceID = rt.RaceID JOIN Rider_List r ON sm.RiderID = r.RiderID WHERE sm.Result = 1 AND sm.ClassID = 1 AND r.DOB IS NOT NULL AND (DATEDIFF(YEAR, r.DOB, rt.RaceDate) - CASE WHEN DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, r.DOB, rt.RaceDate), r.DOB) > rt.RaceDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) <= 19
Only One Brand: SELECT DISTINCT r.FullName FROM Rider_List r JOIN RiderBrandList rb ON r.RiderID = rb.RiderID GROUP BY r.RiderID, r.FullName HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rb.Brand) = 1
